comments:
I have installed EMF,GEF and then VE (all latest versions).
I created a project, and tried to add a file to it using:
New Class ==> Add Visual Class.
It didn't open the VE, it ran a bogus JFrame automaticaly, and nothing
else happened.

I have attached the error log file that I got from opening the VE.

Please help...

From the stack trace it looks like you have a downlevel version of Eclipse
(eclipse.buildId=I20050513-1415). I think that's why the method
org.eclipse.swt.graphics.GC.getAdvanced() cannot be found.

VE 1.1+ requires Eclipse 3.1. Please download and install Eclipse 3.1 and
restart    your workspace using the -clean argument.

If this is still a problem, please reopen this bug report and provide more details.
Thanks... Peter Walker
